original_text:
They will throw dust on their heads, and with weeping and mourning cry out:
“‘Woe! Woe to you, great city,
    where all who had ships on the sea
    became rich through her wealth!
In one hour she has been brought to ruin!’
korean_text: 티끌을 자기 머리에 뿌리고 울며 애통하여 외쳐 이르되 화 있도다 화 있도다 이 큰 성이여 바다에서 배 부리는 모든 자들이 너의 보배로운 상품으로 치부하였더니 한 시간에 망하였도다

sentences.original_text: They will throw dust on their heads
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 자기 머리에 먼지를 던질 것이며

sentences.original_text: Woe! Woe to you, great city
sentences.korean_translation: 화 있도다! 화 있도다, 위대한 도시여

sentences.original_text: where all who had ships on the sea

sentences.korean_translation: 그녀의 부로 인해 부자가 되었던 곳!

sentences.original_text: she has been brought to ruin!
